changelogs.name: Update 3.1.0 release
changelogs.content:
Hey ! While Felix reached 2000 servers, i was not memeing around (well, yes i was, but not all the time)

This update brings a brand new way to calculate experience, it is now harder to reach high levels but you now win slightly more experience each message

Apart from that, a `-s` flag has been added to all moderation commands to add screenshots to the moderation cases, it is of course optional and can be added after with the `reason` command

Also fixed a few bugs on the way, but that's all for now ! See you soon folks !

changelogs.name: Update 3.0.0 release
changelogs.content:
Hey everyone !

Its finally here, the update i 've been working on since 2 month !

This brings a lot of features(first, a stable bot, because previous update wasn 't able to handle a big amount of guilds) but also a starboard, new moderations features, enhanced experience system...

But there 's SO MANY changes in this update that you might want to read the [full changelog](https://github.com/ParadoxalCorp/FelixBot/blob/master/changelog.md)

If you are troubled with a few commandes that don 't have a detailed usage but rather only "shortcuts", well this is because something to make them easier to use is coming in future updates, for now is an example of how to use shortcuts:
`f!<command> <shortcut_name> <argument_if_there_is_one>`
So as a live example
`f!greetings set_target dm`

Some great stuff is incoming folks, if you find any bugs, have any questions or want to request something, don't hesitate to join the[support server](https://discord.gg/Ud49hQJ) !

changelogs.name: Update 3.0.0 Private Beta
changelogs.content:
Hoi hoi ! It's been a long time since the last big update, so here's a quick heads up !
I finished the structure of v3 and rewrote all commands, there is still some stuff to finish(like catching bugs and adding new features) but we're nearly there ! 

On that note, see you at the v3 release(hopefully this month), love you all :heart:

changelogs.name: Update 2.5.0 Public Beta
changelogs.content: Full 2.5.0 release is running on the beta !

marketItems.name: :gift_heart: Love point
marketItems.description: Gives you an extra love point that you can use every 12 hours

marketItems.name: :arrow_double_up: Points booster
marketItems.description: Enable a points booster of +5% each time you win any points, that of course does not apply to transfers
